name: Cosmofall
description:
TUTORIAL:

A / Left arrow - move to the left

D / Right arrow - move to the right

You earn score by picking up oxygen tanks, which also resets your oxygen level.

If your oxygen level reaches 0 / you collide with a sattelite or a meteorite, you die.

*in order for leaderboard to work you have to connect to wifi

CREDITS:

GearCzech - Programming

ToastyBoy0exe - Game art, Sprites
